original_title: National Chamber seminar on ‘VAT and recent amendments’
original_body_lines: The National Chamber of Commerce of Sri Lanka in collaboration with the Department of Inland Revenue, Sri Lanka will be conducting a seminar on “Value Added Tax (VAT) & recent amendments” on 17 January 2024 from 10.00 a.m. to 12.00 noon at the National Chamber Auditorium at No. 450, D. R Wijewardene Mawatha, Colombo 10.

This seminar would be beneficial for the business community to elevate their knowledge and understanding with the recent VAT amendments in Sri Lanka and gain a distinctive edge in managing VAT complexities.

The Resource Personnel and Panelists: A. M. Nafeel, Commissioner of Inland Revenue Department (Panelist), Ms. Dushani Chandrasiri – Senior Deputy Commissioner of Inland Revenue Department (Resource Person), Ms. Chinthani Gunarathna – Senior Deputy Commissioner of Inland Revenue Department (Resource Person).
For registration & further details, kindly contact Nishanthi / Thushari on 011 4 741 788 / 076 2555 707 or email nishanthi@nationalchamber.lk; sect@nationalchamber.lk.
Registration will be accepted on first come first served basis and will be open until 5.00 p.m. Tuesday, 16 January 2024.
